item.title: Go speak - resources for potential speakers
item.description: Alone, we can do so little; together, we can do so much -Helen Keller The Go programming language marked its ninth anniversary in 2018 since it was first publicly announced. Both the language and the community took off ðŸ›«, with no signs of slowing down. Check out Nine years of Go for a brief reflection. Incredible, right?! Whether you’re a newcomer, part of the core team, or a long time enthusiast, there is a role we all play to foster a community that welcomes new ideas and people in this complex and crazy field.
